AuxTools

Class MemStack<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • AuxTools.MemObject<R>
      • AuxTools.MemStack<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - data type of stored objects
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MemStack<R>
extends MemObject<R>
implements java.io.Serializable
    Parametric stack derived from a parametric memory. Errors are reported.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • MemStack

        public MemStack(R[] storage)
         throws MemException
        Stack instantiation. The instantiation only takes place if the memory exists. Otherwise, an error is reported.
        Parameters:
        storage - memory to be used
        Throws:
        MemException - when the memory does not exist

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public void write(R val)
           throws MemException
        Stack push. A parametric object is written into it. If the stack is full, an error is reported.
        Specified by:
        write in class MemObject<R>
        Parameters:
        val - parametric object to be written
        Throws:
        MemException - when the stack is full

      • read

        public R read()
       throws MemException
        Stack pop. A parametric object is read from it. If the stack is empty, an error is reported.
        Specified by:
        read in class MemObject<R>
        Returns:
        last parametric object that was written
        Throws:
        MemException - when the stack is empty
